comment: Main body of Chinese text in vertical columns, printed in black ink on aged paper with a thick black border. The text is arranged from right to left, top to bottom, typical of traditional Chinese printing. The characters are in a formal, uniform style, likely woodblock-printed. On the far left margin, there are small vertical annotations (possibly page or section markers) including '大', '脱文一至二', and '仲奇'. These may indicate editorial notes or pagination.
